doc.plot: Sometimes .. the thought is all that counts. Young Willie Walker is on top of the world as he gets ready for the day. His day. Too bad everyone else forgot; everyone in the old farm house anyway. Still, he receives the birthday gift of a lifetime from a loving heart that no longer beats.
